output:
We know now that in the early years of the 20th century, this world is being watched
closely by intelligences greater than man, yet as mortals and souls.
We know now that as human beings, they tell themselves about their various concerns, what
to keep an eye on, what to touch on, and so this is narrowed to the measure of microseconds
by which we decide to track these creatures, or are we focused by a drop of water?
We know now that at the early years of the 20th century,
large numbers of people lived by intelligence,
great number of men,
yet one of them was a ghost.
We know now that these human beings,
when they were grown, were so very poor,
that they were often eaten by such beasts.
